item.title: Mammogram Recommendations for Women Under 50
item.description: ![](news photo about mammograms,breast cancer,women’s health –ar 2:11.webp) Mammogram Recommendations for Women Under 50 Mammogram screening is a controversial topic, especially for women under 50. The American Cancer Society (ACS) recommends that women start getting mammograms at age 45, while the U.S. Preventive Services Task Force (USPSTF) recommends that women start getting mammograms at age 50.
